title: Chris Kempczinski
itunes:title: Chris Kempczinski
description:
McDonald's has been at the top of the food chain for over 60 years. Its CEO Chris Kempczinski says it's stayed there because of McDonald's guaranteed quality experience and connection to its communities. He discusses why their fries are so addicting, what makes their Coca-Cola perfect and how the restaurant plans to stay on top for another 60 years.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
